Class AbstractServerWebSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.vibe.platform.server.AbstractServerWebSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerWebSocket, Wrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtmosphereServerWebSocket, JwaServerWebSocket, PlayServerWebSocket, VertxServerWebSocket

    public abstract class AbstractServerWebSocket
extends Object
implements ServerWebSocket
    Abstract base class for ServerWebSocket.

    Donghwan Kim

      • closeAction

        public ServerWebSocket closeAction(Action<Void> action)
        Description copied from interface: ServerWebSocket
        Attaches an action for the close event. If the connection is already closed, the handler will be executed on addition. After this event, all the other event will be disabled.
        Specified by:
        closeAction in interface ServerWebSocket

      • errorAction

        public ServerWebSocket errorAction(Action<Throwable> action)
        Description copied from interface: ServerWebSocket
        Attaches an action to handle error from various things. Its exact behavior is platform-specific.
        Specified by:
        errorAction in interface ServerWebSocket
